properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
GABON.
DNC 01.
1. TWO VESSELS ATTACKED IN 04-47S 010-07E
   AT 291250Z OCT. ONE VESSEL HIJACKED IN
   04-42S 010-04E AND OTHER VESSEL UNDERWAY AND SAFE.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3364/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 051601Z NOV 18.
